ClearDisk.ToolTip:
Skip clearing the Local Disk.
Skip this step will also skip Clear-Disk.
This will also skip the New-OSDisk step.

PartitionDisk.ToolTip:
Skip initializing and creating GPT partitions on the Local Disk.
This will also skip the Clear-Disk step.

IsTpmReady.Error:
Device is not fully TPM 2.0 compatible.
Autopilot will not work.
IsTpmReady.Success:
TPM is 2.0 an working as expected.
 Autopilot will work.
IsTpmReady.Warning: Device is not fully TPM 2.0 compatible.

RecoveryPartition.ToolTip:
Recovery Partition is created by default, except when deploying to a Virtual Machine.
Force will always create the Recovery Partition.
Skip will never create the Recovery Partition.
